entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
